EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #21.2019 Dealer Update #21
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - November 4, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | November 2019
New Sales Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins, with more coming in the next few weeks:
- 2019-45 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-45-Satcom-High-Data-Rate-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> Satcom High Data Rate for Business Aircraft - 2020-07 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-07 Rev -_FANS 1 A Upgrade for Business Aircraft Mk III CMU.pdf]]> FANS 1/A Upgrade for Business Aircraft Mk III CMU - 2020-09 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-09-Rev---Multipurpose-Control-and-Display-Unit-Replacement-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> Multipurpose Control and Display Unit Replacement for Business Aircraft
- 2020-13 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-13 Rev - BBJ ACJ ADS-B Out Upgrade Sales Bulletin.pdf]]> BBJ ACJ ADS-B Out Upgrade Sales Bulletin - 2020-14 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-14 SmartRunway SmartLanding Upgrade for Business Aircraft for ET.pdf]]> SmartRunway/SmartLanding Upgrade for Business Aircraft - 2020-15 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-15 CAS-100_TCAS_II_Sales_Promotion.pdf]]> CAS-100 TCAS II Sales_Promotion - 2020-16 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020-16 EGPWS MKV to MKV-A Exchange Promotional Pricing.pdf]]> EGPWS MKV to MKV-A Exchange Promotional Pricing
Dealers can find 2019 and 2020 sales bulletins on MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/JI2qQ00VCX0ZNE00G000000]]> under Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
